formattedAddress: 79 Catherine St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 79 Catherine St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: George is the best driving instructor. Over the course of the lessons (10  or 15 lesson packages) you go through all you need to know to pass the road test smoothly. He makes you practice until you are ready and gives a very clear and honest assessment of whether you are ready or not before taking the test. Very knowledgeable about driving safely, the road test, and teaching foreign drivers. Military-grade efficiency (he taught in the army before and it shows). Highly recommend.

text.text: George is the best driving instructor. Over the course of the lessons (10  or 15 lesson packages) you go through all you need to know to pass the road test smoothly. originalText.text: I am an international driver who needed to pass the road test to obtain a license and I highly recommend this driving academy and especially the instructor George to anyone seeking top-notch instruction. Their excellent teaching skills, invaluable tips, and abundance of practice materials ensure that you'll be well-prepared to conquer the road test and beyond. Trust in their expertise, and you'll be on your way to becoming a skilled and safe driver.

text.text: I am an international driver who needed to pass the road test to obtain a license and I highly recommend this driving academy and especially the instructor George to anyone seeking top-notch instruction. originalText.text:
1st SGT driving Academy combined excellent instruction and years of experience. In an age of factory businesses that are only looking for more money, 1st SGT driving academy is an affordable small business that you can trust. George offers safety first lessons that teach you beyond the test on how to build safe and effective habits. No matter what your skill level is at the onset, the decades of experience George brings is second to none. Yes I passed my test, but more importantly I'm a better driver because of the lessons I received.

100 percent recommend even if you don't live close.

originalText.text: George is a great driving instructor! I had learnt how to drive internationally but hadn't driven in a while so ended up taking the 5 class course with George to refresh. He was extremely helpful going overall the major points of the test and I was able to pass on my first try! Would highly recommend the academy to anyone looking to get their license in New York

originalText.text: George is super helpful, knowledgable and patient when it comes to learning how to drive. Everything you need to know plus extra information is provided during your lessons. Definitely recommend taking the 5 hour pre license class + lessons at 1st SGT Driving Academy!
